stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Site Redirect Leads to Malware
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On or around 23 April 2015 a user was redirected from http://www.drivingrange.com.ec/ to idee93.com which hosted the malicious file avast!.exe (MD5: 18100d9c2f3e6a37c32929ce4d0ef477). The malware called back to micros.zapto.org.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: The user was redirected from www.drivingrange.com.ec to this site, which hosted the malware avast!.exe (MD5: 18100d9c2f3e6a37c32929ce4d0ef477).
This malware was downloaded from idee93.com.
The malware avast!.exe (MD5: 18100d9c2f3e6a37c32929ce4d0ef477) called back to this domain.
